p: Sandalwood oil is a sought-after product due to its unique fragrance, price and pharmacological properties. The anti-inflammatory, anti-infective and antiproliferative effects of sandalwood oil ( Santalum album oil, SAO), and its main ingredient—α-santalol, have been demonstrated in many preclinical studies [ 11, 18]. The anti-inflammatory effects of SAO are believed to be mediated inter alia by inhibition of the cyclooxygenase 1 and 2 and 12-lipoxygenase pathways [ 19].
